description: Architecture description prompts for Brein AI - detailed explanations of brain-inspired components

prompts.hippocampus_description:
The Hippocampus component handles advanced memory processing:

• Encodes new information into retrievable memory representations
• Manages contextual recall and association retrieval
• Processes content for long-term storage and quick access
• Integrates new knowledge with existing memory networks
• Supports episodic and semantic memory formation
prompts.prefrontal_cortex_description:
The Prefrontal Cortex manages complex cognitive processing:

• Handles strategic planning and decision-making
• Performs advanced reasoning and problem-solving
• Manages working memory for complex tasks
• Coordinates multi-step cognitive processes
• Integrates information from multiple sources for comprehensive analysis
prompts.amygdala_description:
The Amygdala provides emotional intelligence and personality:

• Processes emotional context and social cues
• Generates personality-driven, empathetic responses
• Assesses emotional tone and urgency in interactions
• Enhances communication with emotional awareness
• Adapts response style based on emotional context
prompts.thalamus_description:
The Thalamus Router serves as the central coordination hub:

• Analyzes query complexity and requirements
• Routes requests to appropriate cognitive components
• Assesses processing needs and resource allocation
• Coordinates between different brain regions
• Optimizes processing pathways for efficiency
prompts.sal_description:
The System Awareness Layer (SAL) provides overarching coordination:

• Monitors real-time system health and performance
• Enables inter-component communication and synchronization
• Manages adaptive behavior based on system state
• Coordinates cognitive processes across all regions
• Provides self-monitoring and optimization capabilities
prompts.integration_explanation:
These components work together through sophisticated integration:

• SAL coordinates all brain regions for unified operation
• Thalamus routes information to appropriate specialists
• Components share context through awareness layer
• Memory informs reasoning and emotional responses
• Continuous feedback loops enable adaptive behavior
• Result: Coherent, context-aware, and intelligent assistance
